data.title: Roger Birnbaum Biography (1950?-)
data.text:
Theatre, Film, and Television Biographies

Frances Patricia Beck to Val Bisoglio

Roger Birnbaum Biography (1950?-)

Born c. 1950, in Teaneck, NJ; married c. 1985; wife's name, Pamela; children: one.

Male
